post_title: FS: Chase Blue (SGC 45 Double Name) and Chase Pink (SGC 30)
post_content:
Hey guys!  Looking to clear up some room for a future purchase.  Prices include shipping with tracking.  Let me know if you need better back scans, I just don't have my flatbed scanner hooked up right now so had to grab the pics with a webcam.

Send me a pm if you have any questions.  Thanks!

BOTH CARDS ARE NOW SOLD
Chase blue: $270
Chase pink: $200

Take them both for $450

Chase continues to gain steam. Popular player.
